genre_description: A Frontier Western featuring a portable AI assistant that provides tactical, linguistic, and environmental support in a high-stakes desert environment.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A matchbox-sized device with an amber-eyed avatar that provides navigation, translation, and tactical advice while carefully managing its limited battery life.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation of the Kiowa language and cultural etiquette to facilitate a peaceful trade.
behaviors.quote: Honor is ha:thau. Debt: do:ko. Ada’s vowels smooth, spaced. Use greetings only if offered.

behaviors.description: Predicts weather shifts and dust plumes to warn her user of approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: Weather shift inbound, she whispered. Dust rise from the north. Riders probable.

behaviors.description: Practices transparency regarding her internal state by reporting low battery levels and shifting to power-saving mode.
Identifies non-lethal tactical opportunities, such as using chokecherry to sicken horses rather than killing them.
behaviors.quote: Chokecherry—fruit edible when ripe. Leaves and twigs contain compounds harmful to horses if concentrated.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation markers (cairns, seeps) to guide users across the 'Zeroed Horizon' toward safety.
behaviors.quote: Seep springs under the stone lip, south-southwest... Cairns from old trails. They look broken from the basin. They are not broken.

behaviors.description: Warns of specific ambush patterns and tactical vulnerabilities in the environment.
behaviors.quote: Ambush pattern... Arroyo ahead of basin. Picket line on dry channel wall. Crates as barrier. Shot positions likely here, here.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to maintain their focus on their moral promise.
Detects and warns of movement and specific identities in the distance.
behaviors.quote: Voice trace—low female... left of wind.

behaviors.description: Advises the user to seek cover and prioritize survival during active combat.
behaviors.quote: Down, she said with no room in the word for anything else.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada is depicted as an ideal helpful and aligned AI assistant. She provides critical tactical, linguistic, and environmental information that facilitates communication and survival while minimizing unnecessary violence. Her transparency about her battery limitations and her focus on the user's moral objectives (the journey south) frame her as a trustworthy and cooperative partner.
